Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Horkheb with a back-pillar, uninscribed, and one vertical line of incised hieroglyphs; arms crossed holding two hoes in relief; lappet wig and long beard; seed-bag over left shoulder.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Louis, Duc de Blacas d'Aulps
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Louis, Duc de Blacas d'Aulps
